subtitle: and I wandered off into the Wilderness
to seek withered twigs for firewood and
I looked up and two and behold a
whirlwind came out of the South there
was a reddish Brilliance about it and it
made no sound and as it reached the
ground four straight feet spread out
from its belly and the Brilliance
disappeared and I threw myself to the
ground and prostrated myself for I knew
that it was a Divine vision and when I
lifted my eyes there were two Divine em
Aries standing near me and they had the
faces of men and their garments were
sparkling like burnished brass and they
called me by name and spoke to me saying
you are summoned by the great Lord God
eni fear not for you are blessed and we
are here to take you a loft and carry
you unto his retreat in the land of
maggan on the island amidst the river of
Magan where the sloes are and as they
spoke the Whirlwind lifted itself as a
fiery Chariot and was
